fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player with a delayed bullet. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you shoot a player with a delayed bullet, in the following game, they will be attacked on the same night you shot them in the current game.
- You will be considered to be visiting your target both in this game and the next game, however in the current game you will not be seen as an attacking visitor.
- Once per game, you may use a delayed bullet to deal a Basic Attack to a player in **this** game. The above attributes do not apply.
